attributes.action: Make it compulsary for student lets to pay council tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make it compulsary for student lets to pay council tax.
The owners of the properties are reeping a large amount of income by letting to students all of whom use the facilities provided. It is costing home owners more each year in council tax and the property owners are making a good living .
